Name: NUVAVULT
About the game: NUVAVULT is a perspective altering puzzle game where 2D and 3D collide. What intially appears to be a classic 2D platformer soon transforms into something much... deeper. You progress through several zones, each introducing a new way to alter and interact with the world. The 70+ puzzles are designed to reveal how the world works, without the need for explanation. The world is not as flat as it first appears.
Meta Title: NUVAVULT: Nov 25, 2019, Mim Hufford and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on NUVAVULT? Check out the release date (Nov 25, 2019), developer insights from Mim Hufford, and a complete game summary.
